Introduction
This topic contains instructions for processing MEB/PEB determinations, including
processing notice that an IDES participant meets retention standards, is fit for duty, or has been disenrolled
letters to participants who are returned to duty or disenrolled
handling returned mail
when a proposed rating decision is not binding
processing notice that an IDES participant has accepted a PEB decision that they are unfit for duty
, and
how PEBs document their findings
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
